mapper.select: SELECT public."UH_TABLE".id, public."HOBBY".hobby_nm FROM public."UH_TABLE" INNER JOIN public."HOBBY" ON public."UH_TABLE".hobby_cd = public."HOBBY".hobby_cd

SELECT public."USER".user_nm, public."HOBBY".hobby_nm FROM public."USER" INNER JOIN public."UH_TABLE" ON public."USER".id = public."UH_TABLE".id INNER JOIN public."HOBBY" ON public."UH_TABLE".hobby_cd = public."HOBBY".hobby_cd
